wikipedia_page.main: Brian Roy Clarke (born 10 October 1968) is an English former professional footballer. Born in Eastbourne, he played for Gillingham between 1988 and 1992, making 44 appearances in the Football League.

response: Brian Clarke (born 1953) is a British architectural and stained glass artist.
Brian Clarke may also refer to:
* Brian Clarke (footballer, born 1968), English former footballer
* Brian Clarke (Gaelic footballer), Irish Gaelic footballer
* Brian Clarke (author) (born 1938), English author, journalist and angler
